sub_title: Assistant Contracts Officer at European Space Agency - ESTEC
summary:
Sincere, detail-oriented, realistic, client-focused: these are a few words that describe some of my personal
characteristics in a nutshell. Having built my legal knowledge and experience representing prominent foreign and multinational clients, contract law, concessions, regulatory and compliance issues, licensing procedures and procurement processing in, among other industries, energy, oil & gas, mining, infrastructure, and aviation are the most important keywords that describe what I have to offer. In many of the cases that I handled, I have worked together with Clifford Chance LLP, Allen & Overy, Eversheds Southerland and other internationally renowned law firms. I am interested in finding a position as legal counsel or contract lawyer within a multinational working environment that allows for further development in European and/or Dutch law. I have a valid visa/work permit and can work for any company in the Netherlands.

profile_positions.company: KALO & ASSOCIATES, collaborating firm of Andersen Global
profile_positions.description:
KALO & ASSOCIATES, acting as a collaborating firm of Andersen Global, is a leading commercial corporate law practice in Albania. The law firm represents prominent foreign and multinational companies including many Fortune 500 and Fortune 100 companies including Royal Dutch Shell, Halliburton, Baker Hughes, Inditex and others. Areas of practice include contract law, corporate and project finance, commercial litigation, and arbitration in a  variety of industries like energy, oil & gas, tax, telecommunications & media, and intellectual properties. As senior associate, my role expanded from that of the Associate and included inter alia:
* Acted as counsel for a large number of energy industry participants in regulatory, contract, civil litigation, and appellant proceedings. 
* Contributed to improving the legislative framework in alignment with European laws for the power sector, energy efficiency and natural gas.
* Provided legal guidance and advised clients related to greenfield and brownfield investments in Albania including acquisitions, disposals, farm-ins, joint ventures, and commercial agreements.
* Discussed strategy, prepared, and participated in tenders and RFP’s with and for clients in the energy sector.
* Reviewed and provided counselling on licenses, PSCs, concession, power purchase, JOAs, transportation, and off-take agreements, contractor, and operator contracts.
* Drafted (investment) contracts and, on behalf of clients, conducted negotiations with the Government of Albania and regulatory authorities.
* Delivered day-to-day legal advice to clients related to obtaining licenses/rights to exploit natural resources (procurement processes, concession contracts).
* Contributed to (major) projects dealing with major transactions in Albania in aviation, energy concessions, oil & gas productions sharing contracts etc.  
* Deal with a variety of administrative procedures such as revision of company procedures and company policies.

profile_positions.title: Legal Associate

profile_positions.description:
EDG is an Albanian joint stock company. The company has a focus on implementation of construction works and investment (concession contracts) in hydro energy, construction of power lines, mining, and exploitation of natural resources, often together with public authorities and based on public procurement processes. Main responsibilities included:
* Assist participating companies in all legal matters (contract negotiations, procurement contracts, concession contracts etc.).
* Review requests for proposals and offers and invitations to tenders as submitted by Albanian public authorities.
* Review requirements for contracts etc. against appropriate procurement legal framework.
* Identify any legal, administrative, and industrial issues related to procurement activities.
* Perform cross-checks within the procurement legal framework against the European legal framework.
* Prepare files for bidding procedures for participating companies and prepare judicial appeals.
* Defend clients before the Public Procurement Commission (highest hierarchical entity that reviews administrative appeals in tender procedures).
* Supervise contract implementation to ensure settlement of all and any legal and administrative issues.
* Draft submissions and appeals to judicial courts and arbitral tribunals.
* Contributed to building and improving the legislative framework and alignment with the European procurement legal framework.
* Successfully submitted and won bidding procedures for several of my internal clients.
